    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>3c20643f-3be1-445d-a545-ee3a28b9247e#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Teaszüret Indiában</string>
            <string language="en">Tea gathering in India</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tee, der in Indien erfaßt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Thé recueillant en Inde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chá que recolhe em India</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tè che riunisce in India</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τσάι που συλλέγει στην Ινδία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Té que recolecta en la India</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Teaszüret bemutatása Indiában</string>
            <string language="en">Illustration of the tea gathering in India</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Kalkutta,  rabszolgamunka,  bérmunka,  tea,  </string>
            <string language="en">Calcutta, slave-work, paid work, tea</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung des Tees, der in Indien erfaßt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Illustration du thé recueillant en Inde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ilustração do chá que recolhe em India</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione del tè che riunisce in 
India</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση του τσαγιού που συλλέγει στην Ινδία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ilustración del té que recolecta en la India</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalkutta, Sklave-arbeiten, zahlten Arbeit, Tee</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calcutta, slave-work, payé le travail, thé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calcutá, escravo-trabalha, pagou o trabalho, chá</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcutta, schiavo-funziona, pagato il lavoro, tè</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καλκούτα, την σκλάβος-εργασία, που πληρώνεται την εργασία, 
τσάι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calcutta, esclavo-trabaja, pagó el trabajo, té</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
